There wasn't really a suggestions tab on the forums so, I guess general discussion was the next best thing. I think the moderators should add a suggestions tab.

Some suggestions:
A search tab to find authors instead of just titles of games.

A favorites tab, where we can keep all our favorite games to play over and over again.
